languages.text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

languages.text: 每当这把火焰喷射器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，这把火焰喷射器所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果的威力都会提高3点，效果持续至战斗结束。

traits.locale_text: 每当这把火焰喷射器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，这把火焰喷射器所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果的威力都会提高3点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: このフレイマーの攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した各ターゲットに対して、このフレイマーの攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}の威力が戦闘終了時まで3増加される。
languages.original_text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: このフレイマーの攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した各ターゲットに対して、このフレイマーの攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}の威力が戦闘終了時まで3増加される。

languages.text: Интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемого этим огнеметом, до конца боя увеличивается на 3 за каждую затронутую цель.
languages.original_text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемого этим огнеметом, до конца боя увеличивается на 3 за каждую затронутую цель.

languages.text: Por cada objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactado{/g} por el ataque de este lanzallamas, el poder de la {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} infligida por el lanzallamas aumenta en +3 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

languages.text: Für jedes Ziel, das von einem Angriff dieses Flammenwerfers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, erhöht sich die Stärke von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +3.
languages.original_text: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Für jedes Ziel, das von einem Angriff dieses Flammenwerfers {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird, erhöht sich die Stärke von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, bewirkt durch Angriffe dieses Flammenwerfers, bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +3.

languages.text: Pour chaque cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} par l'attaque de ce lance-flammes, la puissance de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé par cette attaque augmente de +3 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
